messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

servers with addresses sent monday re servers with addresses forgot attach server list sent monday servers with addresses hello please open incident assign mistaking we worked weekend we found had quite few problems because some test servers configured with instead static address would need be configured with static addresses current infrastructure set up have dynamic addresses for servers asked past well please assign static addresses any created even if test if there other teams create such please forward request them well although these machines part offer some advice or provide need be set up them best regards technical consultant
